entries.femaleVariant: Takemura here.
Why would I do that?
Hmm... Why would I do that?
Because I am the one who saved your life.
We must meet. Come to Tom's Diner.
Maybe another time.
Can't right now – barely hangin' in there as it is.
You may recall that I saved your life. I need you to return the favor.
Sit.
[Sit]
You do not look so bad.
What do you want?
Seems Viktor saw to your implants.
Take it Vik jump-started your implants.
I like him. He asks no useless questions.
Hey! I was listening to that!
Shut up. Nobody 'cept you wants to watch that shit about that corpo cunt.
What did you say?!
You heard me!
Hm. Least one of you's got some fuckin' sense.
Need time to think it over.
Shouldn't draw attention to ourselves.
Thanks for the offer. Need to think about it, get back to you.
Last thing we wanna do is draw attention.
entries.maleVariant: Last thing we wanna do is to draw attention.

entries.femaleVariant: I'm sorry... A stupid reflex.
Try my luck with Evelyn Parker.
Relic's engineer knows more'n anybody else.
With a bit of luck, I'll track down Evelyn.
I need... time... to plan, organize. You stand to gain much if you help me.
I cannot stay here any longer.
Why'd you help me?
Is this about the biochip?
Why'd you help me, anyway?
This about the biochip? That why I'm here?
Hm. I hear it's damaged beyond repair. Any attempt to extract it would be disastrous, fatal for you.
I needed you to live. That hasn't changed.
Fuckin' 'Saka scum's everywhere.
No, tough guy, you listen.
Listen...
Honor among thieves – ever heard of it?
The Parker woman will not help you.
Zapper-dumples and filth. In some ways, Night City never changes.
But hey, at least Rogue's still alive.
You can help me? Puh-lease.
I don't trust you.
Why should I trust you? Remind me again?
entries.maleVariant: Why should I trust you? Remind me again.

entries.femaleVariant: Trust me, Rogue's heard dumber shit than that. Way back when you weren't even an itch in your daddy's ballsack.
Rogue'll dance to any tune I play her. Just get us to the Afterlife.
Trust me, don't trust me – I don't give a fuck. It's the least of our worries, anyway.
Arasaka's still a despotic machine and the world's on a collision course with chaos.
I have nothing better now. Also, I know no one here, and I am a fugitive, I am hunted.
I have allies prepared to bring Yorinobu to his knees. The only thing I need is proof.
Want me to accuse Yorinobu in front of Arasaka execs?
What if I say no?
What if I say no?
So what, we stroll into Arasaka HQ and announce that Yorinobu's a kinkiller? That he murdered Saburo?
We will get a hearing before reasonable people, in a neutral location. Certain... procedures will be used to establish the truth.
A lie-detector? Forget it.
All I ask is that you do not leave the city.
Anders Hellman – he invented the Relic. If I wanna get rid of it, he's my man.
And if that means pickin' another fight with Arasaka, so be it.
Hellman defected from the company.
I myself spent many days looking for him. He – what's the expression – dropped off the face of the earth.
Why were you looking for Hellman?
Defected? Someone poach him?
Why're you lookin' for Hellman?
Defected? Where to? Some other corp poach him?
entries.maleVariant: Defected? Where to? Some other corp poach 'im?

entries.femaleVariant: As far as I can tell, he acted alone. A meticulous man, he planned it, covered his tracks very well.
He was the one to alert Saburo-san to Yorinobu's schemes. He knew both of them well and could be an important witness.
And you think they'll trust the word of a merc?
Then I will tell you what rewards await if you help me.
I was quickly... dismissed by the "Queen of Fixers" there. Rogue.
I'm... self-employed now.
In that case, another option. You are dying. You do not know how to save yourself.
Yes, I thought it ironic, thieves have none. There is just honor, I believe.
A chip, the Relic, is the culprit. Technology made by Arasaka, technology they alone know.
But I own this place and here I decide. So finish your tea and get the fuck out.
It's people like you two that've brought this country to its knees. Taken our land, our jobs, our fuckin' dignity!
We buddies now?
Leave me alone!
You know, you've got some nerve. First you're out to kill me, now you wanna be my pal? Make like nothing happened?
entries.maleVariant: You know, you got some nerve. First you're out to kill me, now you wanna be my pal. Make like nothing happened.

entries.femaleVariant: Leave me the fuck alone!
I've processed some shit, changed my mind. Don't want you dead anymore.
Go fuck yourself, dickwipe!
Are you still upset about the other night?
You tried to kill me!
Well, I gave it some thought and changed my mind. Don't want ya dead anymore.
Fuck off, you psychopath!
Hey, wasn't easy for me, either. You woke up in a landfill, I woke up in your head. Wrestling with your thoughts, memories. Think we're even.
You got lucky. Vik usually doesn't touch corpo eddies.
Then, in the car, I doubted you would survive.
Vik likes to talk, I guess...
Not many could do what he did. You should be thankful.
The same as you – an outcast. Although for different reasons.
Yorinobu Arasaka must answer for this crime of patricide.
Hah... Lookin' for justice? In Night City?
I seek revenge. Much more feasible here.
This corporation can save you as easily as it can make you disappear. It is merely about getting the right people on your side. Politics.
Tom's a good guy.
Tom's all right. Not afraid to speak his mind, that's all.
He reminds me of my father. He also worked in a kitchen all his life.
Any idea where he took off to?
None.
Yorinobu Arasaka'd agree, I'm sure.
entries.maleVariant: Yorinobu Arasaka would agree, I'm sure.

entries.femaleVariant: And I've taken a step back, looked at things… Think we might be able to help each other. We could start with Rogue. Her and I go back to the stone age.
So you fuckin' know Rogue. What do I say to her? I got a talkin' brain tumor, claims it's her old friend, Johnny?
entries.maleVariant: So you fuckin' know Rogue. What do I say to 'er? Got a talkin' brain tumor, claims it's her old friend, Johnny?

entries.femaleVariant: There is no "us."
You are the ghost of Christmas past, asshole. Any friends you've had are either dead or so old their memory's gone.
entries.maleVariant: You're the ghost of Christmas past, asshole. Any friends you had are either dead or so old their memory's gone.

entries.femaleVariant: Johnny Silverhand died a legend. Nobody forgets that.
Don't need convincin'. Seen your memories. Gross.
You know more than I thought.
Hm, somebody's been busy the last few days.
entries.maleVariant: Somebody's been busy the last few days.

entries.femaleVariant: I will not sit and do nothing when there is information to be found, things to prepare.
Your job, basically.
It was my job.
Corpo rats squeal when hanging by their tails.
entries.maleVariant: Corpo rats'll squeal when hangin' by their tails.

entries.femaleVariant: For several days, I collected information. All leads point to one place – the club called the Afterlife.
She take you for a suit?
No, she saw me as Saburo-sama's killer.
Rogue's well informed, gets wind of most things that happen in the city. Might be worth askin' her about Hellman.
Were I you, I would think about a plan B.
I wish you luck. The woman is choosy, expensive and rude.
Do what you want, look for Parker, Hellman, whoever. I must see some friends, call in some favors.
When my people in Arasaka are ready to listen, I will call you.
Till then, I guess.
If by some miracle you find Hellman, please notify me. He and I have unfinished business.
[Calm Takemura] Chill.
You know you don't gotta speak out loud to talk to me.
You don't need to speak out loud to talk to me.
Haven't managed to get my head straight yet, not after everything that happened.
That will not happen anytime soon. And so what?
If you intend to live, you must reenter the ring. The bell has already tolled.
Tom's Diner. I am waiting.
What do you want?!
What do you want from me?
Been thinkin' I oughta have a word with her myself. She promised to help me get rid of the chip.
Evelyn... what's she to you?
She and Yorinobu Arasaka had intimate relations... She knows how to get to him.
Just answered your own question.
I would not count on that. She is likely gone, very far away.
Been lookin' for her?
Why do you believe she could help you remove the chip? Does a corporation help her?
Why you figure she skipped town?
Just answered your own question 'bout where Evelyn is – long gone.
I tried to locate her but had no success. I suspect she covered her tracks.
You said Parker could help you remove the Relic... Does she work for a corporation?
Think so, yeah.
Askin' too many questions.
What's it you actually want from me?
Got no clue.
Don't think so, no.
No idea.
Suspect so, yeah.
Nope. You're startin' to stink, period.
You got tossed out, lumped with the outcasts, easily. Or have you forgotten?
An enigma, to be sure, but she showed that slyness you get in corpo agents... You know the kind.
I, too, possess this "slyness" you speak of?
Don't think so, no.
Can you expand?
Evelyn was knowledgeable about the Relic. Had a large chunk of classified info.
And I, too, stink of "skullduggery?"
Don't matter how much perfume a corpo sprays on mornings, by lunch that's replaced by the stench of skullduggery. Only thing I caught from Evelyn was determination.
[Stand] OK, got a life to save – my own, so…
You have many interesting things to say.
Might be your turn now to say something interesting.
You ask a lot of questions.
I intend to punish Yorinobu Arasaka severely for the crime he has committed.
[Stand] Better be goin'.
Sorry I couldn't be of any help. Don't have any time to lose, so...
entries.maleVariant: Sorry couldn't be of any help. Don't have any time to lose, so...

entries.femaleVariant: Is that all? Really should be goin'.
V, wait. I need you.
Wait.
If she could not help you before, she will not manage to now.
To begin, you must tell me where to find Evelyn Parker.
[Stand] There is no "us!"
Anders Hellman – mean those kinds of people?
What kind of people we talkin' about?
Exactly what kind of people are we talkin' about?
Ya mean people like Anders Hellman?
entries.maleVariant: You mean people like Anders Hellman?

entries.femaleVariant: People who hold Arasaka dear, are its heart. People interested in the corporation's stable growth.
You know this name how?
Prepped for the heist, thoroughly. Relic is Hellman's design, his creation.
Untrue – he is a pawn. I was thinking of one much more powerful.
Besides, Anders Hellman escaped Arasaka, betrayed it.
Leave? Why would I leave? Need help, best chance I'll find the right person here.
Someone other than Arasaka specialists? There is no one, no alternative.
Actually, we just talked about some.
Let it go, Takemura.
She spot the corpo in you?
No experience talkin' to people like that?
Mean to say you worked for Saburo yet got no idea how to talk to the high and mighty?
She wished to have nothing to do with the man accused of murdering Saburo Arasaka.
